definition: a combination of three or more notes that blend harmoniously when sounded together, to bring into consonance, harmony, or accord while making music or singing
details:
noun
- a combination of three or more notes that blend harmoniously when sounded together
- a straight line connecting two points on a curve
verb
- to bring into consonance, harmony, or accord while making music or singing
= synonyms: harmonize, harmonise
- to play chords on a string instrument
